sentences.en: I heard stories of gruesome tortures in prisons.
sentences.cn: 我听说过监狱里令人毛骨悚然的刑讯。

sentences.en: We spent a week in a gruesome apartment in Miami.
sentences.cn: 我们在迈阿密一套糟糕透顶的公寓里住了一星期。

sentences.en: There has been a series of gruesome murders in the capital.
sentences.cn: 在首都发生了一连串恐怖的谋杀案。
